General.Name: Ficont Industry (Beijing) Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Ficont Industry (Beijing) Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and supply of wind turbine tower internals and safety systems for wind turbine manufactures in China and internationally. The company offers service lifts, climb auto systems, climb assists, evacuation and rescue devices, auto descending devices, fall protection systems, sealed self-retracting lifeline products, personal protective equipment, offshore cranes, aluminum ladders, blade maintenance platforms, platforms, suspended platforms, material hoists, and tower internal solutions. It also provides engineering, kit-setting and procurement, and training services, as well as installation, maintenance, and troubleshooting services; and retrofit solutions. The company serves wind turbine manufactures, tower manufacturers, service providers, and wind farm owners. The company was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Tianjin, China.
